titleStmt.title: Instructions agreed upon by the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, to be observed in taking, examining, and determining the accompts of all officers and souldiers, who have actually and faithfully served under their command in the kingome of England and dominion of Wales from or since the beginning of these wars.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Die Veneris, 28. Maii, 1647.
Reproduction of original in: Birmingham Central Reference Library (Birmingham, England).

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Bayley
